about_the_game:
Dive into the world of game development with OpenVision, a powerful 2D game engine designed by Jonathan Peri and Itay Natan. With its graphics engine and physics engines, OpenVision empowers you to craft mesmerizing games that boast smooth gameplay and responsive controls.

The best part? OpenVision is not only completely free but also open source, giving you the freedom to customize and enhance it according to your desires. Immerse yourself in a welcoming community of passionate developers, where collaboration thrives and sharing your masterpieces with others is encouraged.

Google Mentoring has recognized OpenVision for its excellence and credibility in the game development domain, further establishing its reputation within the industry.

Whether you're an experienced pro or just taking your first steps into game development, OpenVision provides an intuitive user-friendly interface that caters to all skill levels. Unleash your creativity and breathe life into your game ideas with OpenVision. Begin your journey today and transform your dreams into reality!

short_description: OpenVision is a game engine developed by Jonathan peri and Itay natan, it contains features like 2d physics, C++ scripting, OpenGL rendering and overall a game engine whice is completly open for the user and delivers a nice balance between high level programming and low level programming.
